statements: SELECT * FROM inventory
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price FROM inventory
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE product_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE last_updated >= '2022-01-01' AND last_updated <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity ASC, price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products ORDER BY quantity_in_stock DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE quantity_in_stock > 50;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE product_id = 101 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE quantity_in_stock < 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, SUM(quantity_in_stock) AS total_stock FROM products GROUP BY product_id, product_name HAVING total_stock > 200;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM Orders WHERE quantity_ordered >= 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT Suppliers.supplier_name, Orders.quantity_ordered FROM Suppliers JOIN Orders ON Suppliers.id = Orders.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT Orders.order_id, Inventory.product_name, Orders.quantity_ordered FROM Orders JOIN Inventory ON Orders.product_id = Inventory.id
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM Products WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Products.product_name, Orders.quantity_ordered FROM Orders INNER JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id WHERE Orders.order_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY Orders.order_date ASC;

SELECT Customers.customer_name, Orders.order_id, Products.price FROM Customers LEFT JOIN Orders ON Customers.customer_id = Orders.customer_id LEFT JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id ORDER BY Customers.customer_name ASC;

SELECT Products.product_name, Inventory.in_stock, Products.quantity * Products.price AS total_value FROM Products INNER JOIN Inventory ON Products.product_id = Inventory.product_id ORDER BY total_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN (SELECT product_id FROM Orders WHERE order_date > '2021-06-01') ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT supplier_name FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id WHERE quantity > 5 AND supplier_id = 3;

SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, products.product_name, orders.quantity FROM suppliers INNER JOIN orders ON suppliers.supplier_id = orders.supplier_id INNER JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;

SELECT customers.customer_name, SUM(orders.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM customers INNER JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id INNER JOIN orders ON transactions.order_id = orders.order_id GROUP BY customers.customer_name;

SELECT products.product_name, suppliers.supplier_name, orders.quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.product_id = orders.product_id JOIN suppliers ON orders.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE orders.quantity >= 10;
